name: WITCHSΔVER
description:
WARNING : the game uses some weird shader things that only work on few computers, I wasn't able to fix the bug, I might try again later when I have more time

The crash happens during the broom game, everything freezes and the only thing you can do is quit the game

It may work on your computer but it probably won't, again, I'm sorry

__________________________

Your screensaver is cursed! Peep into a witch’s home in her absence, and play along with her magic items and pets in a trio of Warioware-inspired mini games playable with mouse-only! Beware: if you fail, you are kicked out and must wait until it appears again…

- an actual playable screensaver -

.

.

.

.

-INSTALLATION INFOS -

Download the zip file, install the screensaver with the installer, it will take care of where the files should go, 

the only thing you have to do is go to your screensaver settings (in Win10 you can find the settings in Personalization/Lock Screen and screen saver settings at the bottom)

set the screensaver to 1 (it's the name of the build) and set a desired duration for the screen saver.

DO NOT PRESS SETTINGS OR PREVIEW (I can't make a working build with the command line)

it should cursed your computer, then all you have to do is close the screensaver settings window and wait a bit or go for a walk

if you're experiencing any trouble please reach us so we can help you troubleshoot the issue.

thank you for installing our screensaver <3
